name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smite : Add Fun Quizzes to YouTube Videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance YouTube with Smite! Add interactive quizzes to videos for fun challenges, learning, or testing knowledge!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smite: Add Fun Quizzes to YouTube Videos

Overview:
Take your YouTube experience to the next level with Smite! This extension allows you to seamlessly integrate engaging and interactive quizzes right below YouTube videos. Whether you’re a content creator looking to interact with your audience, a teacher sharing educational content, or a viewer who loves a fun challenge, Smite has got you covered!

Key Features:
- Interactive Quizzes: Add customizable quizzes directly under YouTube videos.
- Easy to Use: Simple setup – no coding required!

How It Works:
1. Install the Smite Chrome Extension.
2. Open any YouTube video.
3. Start creating or enjoying quizzes directly on the video page.

Get ready to learn, challenge yourself, and have fun with Smite!
